name: OS X Gather Messages
author: Geckom <geckom@redteamr.com>
description:
This module will collect the Messages sqlite3 database files and chat logs
        from the victim's machine. There are four actions you may choose: DBFILE,
        READABLE, LATEST, and ALL. DBFILE and READABLE will retrieve all messages, and
        LATEST will retrieve the last X number of messages (useful with 2FA). Module
        was tested with OS X 10.11 (El Capitan).

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: MSGCOUNT
options.description: Number of latest messages to retrieve.

options.name: USER
options.description: Username to retrieve messages from (defaults to current user)
